name: Unique Learning System
description: Comprehensive, standards-aligned curriculum designed specifically for students with moderate to severe disabilities. Provides differentiated instruction with interactive lessons, assessments, and data tracking.
features: Interactive lessons; Differentiated content; Standards alignment; Progress monitoring; Assessment tools; Data reporting
subjects: Reading/ELA; Math; Science; Social Studies; Life Skills

name: Siras Systems
description: Assistive technology solutions for individuals with communication and mobility challenges. Provides customizable communication devices and software.
features: Speech generation; Eye gaze technology; Switch access; Customizable interfaces; Communication boards

name: LessonPix Visual Schedules
description: Visual schedule creation tool that helps students with autism and special needs understand daily routines through picture-based schedules and social stories.
features: Visual schedules; Picture library; Customizable templates; Social stories; Routine building; Print capabilities
subjects: Special Education; Life Skills; Behavior Management

name: SymbolStix PRIME
description: Symbol-based learning platform with over 50,000 educational symbols designed to support literacy, communication, and curriculum access for diverse learners.
features: Symbol library; Literacy support; Curriculum integration; Communication aids; Customizable materials; Multi-language support
subjects: Reading/ELA; Communication; Special Education; Life Skills

name: Boardmaker
description: Industry-leading symbol and communication software that helps create visual supports, communication boards, and educational materials for students with special needs.
features: Communication boards; Symbol library; Template creation; Visual supports; AAC tools; Print and digital formats
subjects: Communication; Special Education; AAC; Life Skills

name: Verbal Me
description: Speech-generating app designed for individuals with autism and communication difficulties, featuring customizable communication boards and voice output.
features: Voice output; Customizable boards; Picture communication; Text-to-speech; Offline capability; Simple interface

name: GoTalk NOW
description: Communication app that turns tablets and smartphones into powerful speech-generating devices with customizable communication pages and natural-sounding voices.
features: Speech generation; Customizable pages; Natural voices; Picture support; Easy navigation; Cloud sync
subjects: Communication; AAC; Special Education; Speech Therapy

name: Boom Cards
description: Interactive, self-checking digital task cards that engage students in fun, game-like learning activities across multiple subjects with instant feedback.
features: Self-checking activities; Interactive games; Progress tracking; Multi-device access; Teacher dashboard; Standards alignment
subjects: Math; Reading/ELA; Science; Social Studies; ESL; Special Education
